course_description: Mathematical foundations and efficient implementation of popular machine learning models. Topics include: regression and classification techniques, deep learning, model evaluation and practical Implementation.
prerequisites: (MATH 210 or MATH_OX 210 or MATH 211 or MATH_OX 211) and (MATH 221 or MATH_OX 221) and (CS 170 or CS_OX 170 or MATH 170) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
schedule_location: MW 8:30am-9:45am in Math & Science Center - N301
